name: McShootie
description:
Welcome to McShootie's little village. In here there isn't much to do except enjoying what life has to offer. Camping, getting drinks from the soda machine and fighting of an infinite supply of zombies and droids that want to take the land for some reason.

McShootie is a small project made over a few weeks, aiming to be a simple run-n-gun game with two playable characters to offer some mild variation to the gameplay.

It should be noted that the game can't be paused, and only exited through Main Menu and Game Over screen.
